subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods swept the three biggest annual awards for the seventh time. He received the Jack Nicklaus Trophy for player of the year, the Arnold Palmer award for leading the money list ($10.8 million) and the Byron Nelson award for lowest-scoring average (67.79). Jay Haas was voted Champions Tour player of the year, and Nick Flanagan won the Nationwide award. The other PGA Tour awards went to Steve Stricker, the first player to win comeback player of the year in consecutive seasons, and Brandt Snedeker, who was the rookie of the year.
